subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: Danilo Gallinari sat out the Knicks’ practice Tuesday because of a sore back and is listed as questionable for Wednesday’s Summer League game in Las Vegas. Gallinari, the sixth pick in the June draft, hurt his back in his N.B.A. debut Monday in a collision with Cleveland’s Robert Traylor. The team does not consider the injury to be serious.
